ValidationRule.description: Makes users go through each status in a lead
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: CASE(Status, "1-Lead Identified",1, "2-Insurance Verification Completed",2, "3-Intake Completed",3, "4-BPS Completed",4, "5-Clinical Clearance Completed",5, "6-SOC Scheduled",6, "7-First Visit Scheduled",7, "8-Qualified",8, 0) > CASE(PRIORVALUE(Status), "1-Lead Identified",1, "2-Insurance Verification Completed",2, "3-Intake Completed",3, "4-BPS Completed",4, "5-Clinical Clearance Completed",5, "6-SOC Scheduled",6, "7-First Visit Scheduled",7, "8-Qualified",8, 0) + 1
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot Skip Statuses. You can only move to the next stage
